add_token_description:
Add a token to your wallet. This will cost
{{cost}} SOL.
allow_send_transactions:
This setting allows sending some transactions on your behalf
without requesting your permission for the remainder of this
session.
allow_site: Allow this site to access your Solana account?
choose_password_description: Optionally pick a password to protect your wallet.
connect_ledger_solana_app: Connect your ledger and open the Solana application
create_new_wallet_description: Create a new wallet to hold Solana and SPL tokens.
create_new_wallet_instructions:
Please write down the following twenty four words and keep them in a
safe place:
delete_message:
You will not be able to recover the current accounts without the
seed phrase, and the account private key. This action will delete
all current accounts from your browser.
delete_message_strong:
To prevent loss of funds, please ensure you have the seed phrase
and the private key for all current accounts.
destination_address_not_match: Destination address mint does not match
enter_spl_or_solana_address: Enter SPL token or Solana address
keep_window_open:
Please keep this window open. You will need to approve the request
on MetaMask to complete the transaction.
name: Name
native_btc_conversion:
Native BTC can be converted to SPL {{tokenName}} by sending it to the
following address:
only_sites_you_trust: Only connect with sites you trust.
others_deposit_address:
This address can only be used to receive
{{tokenSymbol}}. Do not send SOL to
this address.
password_forget_instruction:
If you forget your password you will need to restore your wallet using
your seed words.
private_keys_storage:
Your private keys are only stored on your current computer or device.
You will need these words to restore your wallet if your browser's
storage is cleared or your device is damaged or lost.
restore_wallet_description:
Restore your wallet using your twelve or twenty-four seed words. Note that this
will delete any existing wallet on this device.
saved_words_check: I have saved these words in a safe place.
sol_deposit_address:
This address can only be used to receive SOL. Do not send other
tokens to this address.
sollet_derivation_path: By default, sollet will use m/44'/501'/0'/0' as the derivation path for the main wallet. To use an alternative path, try restoring an existing wallet.
token_conversion_details:
{{type}} {{ticker}} can be
converted to {{mint}} {{tokenName}} via MetaMask.
To convert, you must already have SOL in your wallet.
valid_spl_token_address: Address is a valid SPL token address
